name: Timelapse Flight | London Heathrow to Zurich | Swiss Airbus A321
description:
A timelapse flight from London Heathrow to Zurich, onboard Swiss Airbus A321 HB-IOM operating flight LX317 on 30 January 2016.

Full flight in real time: https://youtu.be/EeNaftpoj08

Due to the late inbound arrival of the aircraft, we missed our slot  at Heathrow and had to wait at the gate for a short time, before pushing back and joining the queue for runway 27L.  After several aircraft depart ahead of us we line up and power off of Heathrow's runway 27L, making a left turn following the Detling 2F departure towards Dover.  We maintain 6,000ft as per the SID which gets us a great view of Gatwick Airport before we continue our climb up to an eventual altitude of 37,000ft.  We  cross the English Channel towards Belgium, before continuing on to Luxembourg, eastern France and finally Switzerland, where we make a beautiful approach and landing onto runway 14 at Zurich.


Airline:  Swiss
Flight:  LX317
Aircraft:  Airbus A321 HB-IOM
From:  London Heathrow (LHR)
To:  Zurich (ZRH)
Departure:  09:46
Arrival:  12:02
Flight Time:  01:16
Seat:  8F
Flight Path: http://goo.gl/bvxykW

Filmed from seat 8F.
